body.name: ALPOWL Wireless Microphone, UHF Dual Handheld Cordless Microphone with Rechargeable Receiver, 40H Duration, 200ft Range, Microphone for Singing, Karaoke, Church, Speech, Wedding, Party Singing
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: [Truly Wireless Long Distance Range]--Wireless microphone updates UHF frequency which makes the connection range up to 200Ft (60m). It makes of exquisite technology that Microphone has more stable signal. tamper-proof, 0 delay! It’s very suitable for family karaoke, churches, weddings, conferences, and small stage performances.

[Easy to Use]--Don’t know how to set the frequency? No worry, we have already matched for you. Microphone comes with 1 microphone receiver, you just need to plug the receiver into the machine as long as the machine has a microphone input jack. It supports 6.5mm and 3.5mm (Package contains a 6.5mm to 3.5mm adapter) microphone jack connection which is compatible with lots of devices such as sound cards, speakers, karaoke machines, etc

[Long Duration&Rechargeable Battery]--Microphone comes with 800 mah batteries, it could work for 40h. Microphones and receiver all adopt USB-C charging port that only need 2-3h to fully charge. No need to buy battery again and again

[Clear Sound Pick Up]--UHF dual handheld cordless microphone was designed with DSP noise reduction technology, it could reduce the background noise to the most degree and clearly pick up the human voice. The package also contains two microphone sleeves that could keep the hygiene and have a better sound pick up.

[Service Guarantee]--Please read the manual carefully before using the product. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our 7*24 online reply customer service. Our microphones support half year free replacement warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mics worked great at a large event, sounds clear even from a distance of 25 ft.Good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent Microphones for Karoake
reviews.reviewText: Date: Wed Jan 31 2024Item: ALPOWL Wireless Microphone, UHF Dual Handheld Cord...VINE DISCLAIMER:--------------------------------In the spirit of full disclosure, I received this product free as part of the Amazon Vine program. My methodology for Vine Program products is to give a more thorough -- often product-destructive -- review. If I like the product, I buy my own version of it, otherwise, it gets donated post-testing. I may include my opinion on the product's value proposition to the market.REVIEW:--------------------------------This is a decent quality microphone that you might use for small gatherings or karaoke in your garage. It has a very basic transmitter setup, and quality will be what you should expect at this price point, meaning that anything on the edge of the audio frequency spectrum might not be reproduced very well.Build quality is okay, but not high-grade, and I would not expect this thing to stand up to any level of abuse or frequent use. The battery cell is a generic 18650 cell that is common in many rechargeable electronics these days, it is replaceable, and pops in/out so that is one thing you can upgrade if you find it doesn't last very long for your needs.END NOTE:--------------------------------And with all the reviews I do, if there's ever a problem with this product, I will edit (if able) to update this review. These will be denoted in an "UPDATES" section.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Price
reviews.reviewText: These were good for the price and for karaoke at home. I have no complaints :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A waste of money
reviews.reviewText: This a huge fail. There is not a manuel in the box. The description of product states there is a 24 hour support for customers. No phone number is given, it's not in the sellers profile and you can't find it online either. Messaging with seller was not a good experience. No help at all and wouldn't give me the phone number to troubleshoot. There is no volumn control and barely makes any sound at all. You can cup your hands around the top if you want to someone to hear you a few feet away. Save your money, time sending it back for a refund.and pass this one by.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for low-price microphones
reviews.reviewText: No issues and they work as expected. Glad they are rechargeable. Wish there was a mute button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Budget Set Of Mics
reviews.reviewText: I like how these microphones do not require batteries, and use rechargeable power.However, they only come with a single power cord for both mics and the receiver.The construction feels light and flimsy, and the mics rattle when moved... This rattling can be picked up by the microphone.There is a slight low electrical hum, but I did not have any interference issues.Would work great as a backup pair of karaoke microphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: The microphones that came with our karaoke machine stopped working and we thought that this would be a great alternative option. The sound quality is even better than our original and the best thing is that it doesn’t need any batteries! It’s usb-c charging and you never need to worry about buying batteries for it or leaving it on for an extended period of time. Just charge it up and you’re ready to go. This is definitely something we would purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice form factor, great charging setup, but not as "professional" as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like these. I really did. My current set of wireless karaoke mics need AA batteries swapped in often, and the receiver is a sizable box (larger than my speaker amp, actually). These have everything I’ve wanted in a wireless mic set: a compact receiver with good reception over a decent distance, rechargeable without some proprietary connector/charging cable (everything is rechargeable with a USB Type-C connector), support for 2 mics on one 1/4" input to my amp, even replaceable rechargeable batteries! This set should be absolutely amazing!However, it has one flaw that means I’m unlikely to use it: whenever anything low-frequency goes into the mic (singing or speaking with any sort of bass, or tapping the mic, whether intentionally or not, and not even on the tip – even the sides of the mic, while holding it, will do the trick) causes a VERY audible crackling noise to accompany the audio. I don’t know if this is a side-effect of the “audio reference companding” that the box mentions over and over, but it makes it unusable for me as a karaoke mic. (FYI, “companding” is a real term, meaning compressing + expanding, and could account for frequency-specific issues like what I’m hearing from these. It is usually a good thing, when implemented well, but in this case, the low end seems to have some issue.) It's possible that the mics are aggressively trying to separate noise from voice, but if that’s the case, it’s not doing a good job of it. Certainly not the quality you’d get from higher end mics, but you get what you pay for.The listing mentions XLR and “corded electric” power – the only time you have corded electric power is when charging these – they’re wireless…The microphones claim to be using frequencies in the 700-800MHz range… which may also interfere with LTE/5G, so that could be a concern as well. I haven’t looked at it in great detail, and I don’t have a spectrum analyzer to confirm that those frequencies are indeed being used, but I do know that some companies selling wireless mics have had to reduce the number of frequencies that they operate in due to LTE/5G band acquisitions in the USA, and I suspect the 700-800MHz range may be dicey to run these in. Hopefully the FCC doesn’t come knocking on our door…I may give these a try in some other locations, just to see if what I’m encountering with the sound quality is due to some localized interference… but I really kind of doubt it, since it doesn’t seem to occur when my wife or son speak into it, so it seems to be something to do with lower vocal frequencies getting clipped. If there’s a way to fix that, then I’d love these things!All in all, these work to some degree, and I have no way to tell if the issues I have are one-off issues or not. For some people, these may work just fine (especially if your voice is higher than mine, apparently). But for me, I guess I'd better stock up on AA batteries and hold onto my old set of mics. I'll keep these around for karaoke nights and hand them to the ladies.

reviews.reviewTitle: super rapport qualité prix, le moins cher que j'ai trouvé
Sorprendente relación calidad precio para los micrófonos
reviews.reviewText: Tenia un microfono de cable y compre este pack con dos micrófonos inalámbricos para evitar usar cable en mis actuaciones como djs cuando se requiere interacciones con el publico para hacer peticiones o cantar por el micro. Encima al tener dos lo he podido usar para hacer una fiesta con especial karaoke. El sonido es mucho mas potente que el micro de cable que usaba antes y la batería me dura de sobra para una actuación de cinco horas.

Provato in una serata karaoke funzionano benissimo una buona portata e dopo 4 ore erano ancora carichi, installazione semplice basta collegarlo alla radio e tutti funziona...Co spigliato a un prezzo modico

Buscaba unos micrófonos para poder pasar fiestas con amigos y familia, y poder hacer un karaoke. Tuve algún problema con uno de los micros, pero el vendedor, muy simpático, me lo resolvió bastante rápido.Llevo poco tiempo con ellos, pero son como se muestran. La verdad que yo no esperaba que sonasen tan fuertes y tan bien (para el uso que yo les quiero dar).Eso de que no tengan cables es muy cómodo, ya los he cargado en alguna ocasión y las baterias de todo aguantan bastante.Estoy muy satisfecha con la compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: Connection un peu incertaine avec mon enceinte
reviews.reviewText: Micros sans fil utilisés pour un texte d'accompagnement de morceaux de musique. J'ai trouvé qu'il y avait de parasites.
